alert.note: Alert for Mercer (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 10:01AM CDT until April 13 at 9:25PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Bismarck ND has issued a Flood Warning for Spring Creek at Zap affecting Mercer County in North Dakota... ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spring Creek at Zap. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Right bank overflows-west end of Zap begins to flood. Crop land and county roads flood along creek as well. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was estimated to be around 12 feet. - Forecast...Ice is affecting the river gage. It will rise above flood stage early this afternoon to a crest of 16 feet by this evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.0 feet on 04/07/1949. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
